title: Metal Gear Movie: Oscar Isaac is Solid Snake - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.04.20
description:
It's time to take out the trash in the Legend of Bum-bo! Available now on Google Play for $14.99 and Play Pass holders can play it for free! Greg and Blessing talk about Oscar Isaac joining the Metal Gear Solid movie, BioWare shake-ups, and more!


00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
It’s your final weekend without Cyberpunk, why not pop over and listen to PSILY’s hopes and fears episode?
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 - Oscar Issac to be Snake in Metal Gear Solid Movie, Justin Kroll @ Deadline
00:27:10 - Casey Hudson, Mark Darrah Leave BioWare, Dorno @ IGN
00:41:30 - Persona 5 Strikers coming West, via Wario 64
00:43:00 - When a slip up like this happens, what goes down in the company itself? - Best Friends Q:Mitch Krassin
00:46:20 -  Ad
00:52:08 - Sony spent three times what Xbox Did for Launch, Ilyse Liffreing @ Ad Age
00:57:55 - Great news: PAX is back… if we’re not all dead
01:01:00 - Out today
01:03:13 - Squad Up:Jeffrey P Long(Xbox)Jeffrey P Long
01:03:55 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Bless and Imran
WED: Greg and Gary
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
